name: Wicked Woods
description:
Wicked Woods is a retro, fixed-camera horror game that follows a government black op in the heart of an American Midwest forest. An inter-dimensional government mining operation has gone wrong, causing a dark sorceress and her minions to invade the mining facility, killing all of the workers inside. You must travel to the base and stop the sorceress' rampage.

*Note: Wicked Woods can optionally be enhanced with a mouse in addition to the keyboard*
